summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6263 for the improvement of Northeast 90th Street from 17th Ave. Northeast to Bothell Way Northeast; and certain other streets and avenues; by constructing watermains together with fire hydrants and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 91106 as amended by Ordinance No. 91169, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
